ai-thig13.5:1.1_0: “I was so young, my clothes so fresh,
ai-thig13.5:1.2_0: at that time I heard the teaching.
ai-thig13.5:2.1_0: and then I became profoundly dispassionate
ai-thig13.5:3.1_0: after abandoning her relatives, and while worshipping her relatives,
ai-thig13.5:3.3_0: and my flourishing villages and lands,
ai-thig13.5:4.2_0: all that is no small wealth.
ai-thig13.5:4.3_0: Now that I’ve gone forth in faith like this,
ai-thig13.5:4.4_0: when the true teaching has been so well proclaimed,
ai-thig13.5:5.1_0: it’s not appropriate for you to be reborn.
ai-thig13.5:5.2_0: You should know what is suitable,
ai-thig13.5:5.3_0: to take back gold and money,
ai-thig13.5:6.2_0: doesn’t lead to peace and awakening.
ai-thig13.5:6.4_0: it’s not the wealth of the noble ones;
ai-thig13.5:9.4_0: he has come to ruinate places;
ai-thig13.5:10.2_0: to pleasures, as if you were my enemies?
ai-thig13.5:10.3_0: Know me on the going forth,
ai-thig13.5:11.1_0: It’s not due to gold, coined or uncoined,
ai-thig13.5:11.2_0: that defilements come to an end.
ai-thig13.5:11.3_0: Sensual pleasures are enemies and murderers,
ai-thig13.5:11.4_0: hostile forces that bind you to thorns.
ai-thig13.5:12.2_0: to pleasures, as if you were my enemies?
ai-thig13.5:12.3_0: Know me on the going forth,
ai-thig13.5:12.4_0: shaven, wrapped in my outer robe.
ai-thig13.5:13.2_0: the root of a tree as lodging,
ai-thig13.5:13.4_0: the essentials of the homeless life.
ai-thig13.5:14.1_0: quenched to the realm of the great hermit,
ai-thig13.5:14.3_0: Safe in their sanctuary, they are freed,
ai-thig13.5:15.1_0: May I not encounter sensual pleasures,
ai-thig13.5:15.2_0: for no shelter is found in them.
ai-thig13.5:15.3_0: Sensual pleasures are enemies and murderers,
ai-thig13.5:15.4_0: like a hair-tip with an iron ball,
ai-thig13.5:16.1_0: Greed is an obstacle, a threat,
ai-thig13.5:16.4_0: its limbs like a great man,
ai-thig13.5:17.2_0: Sensual pleasures are similar to forms,
ai-thig13.5:18.1_0: Stuck in the mud of sensual pleasures,
ai-thig13.5:18.2_0: there are so many ignorant in the world.
ai-thig13.5:18.3_0: Though the truth do not know,
ai-thig13.5:19.2_0: people jump right on to the path that goes to a bad place.
ai-thig13.5:20.1_0: That’s how sensual pleasures create enemies;
ai-thig13.5:20.2_0: they are so tormenting, so corrupting,
ai-thig13.5:20.4_0: they are nothing less than the bonds of death.
ai-thig13.5:21.1_0: by removing the claspsing their knees,
ai-thig13.5:21.3_0: They’re a snare laid by Māra
ai-thig13.5:22.2_0: they’re full of suffering, a terrible poison;
ai-thig13.5:22.3_0: offering little gratification, they’re makers of strife,
ai-thig13.5:23.1_0: Since I’ve created so much ruination
ai-thig13.5:25.3_0: I shall go to the path
ai-thig13.5:25.4_0: by which the hermits have crossed over.”
ai-thig13.5:26.1_0: “Look at this: Subhā the smith’s daughter,
ai-thig13.5:26.3_0: She has entered the imperturbable state,
ai-thig13.5:26.4_0: meditating at the root of a tree.
ai-thig13.5:27.1_0: It’s just eight days since she went forth,
ai-thig13.5:27.2_0: full of faith in the beautiful teaching.
ai-thig13.5:27.4_0: she is master of the three knowledges, destroyer of death.
ai-thig13.5:28.1_0: This one is freed from slavery and debt,
ai-thig13.5:28.4_0: she has completed the task and is free of defilements.”
ai-thig13.5:29.1_0: Thus did Sakka, lord of all creatures,
ai-thig13.5:29.2_0: along with a host of gods,
ai-thig13.5:29.3_0: having come by their psychic powers,
ai-thig13.5:31.1_0: The Book of the Twenties is finished.
